The '''Cherry Blossom cape'''{{only|je|short=1}} or '''Cherry Cape'''{{only|be|short=1}} is a [[cape]] given to players who voted on the [[Minecraft Live 2023#Mob Vote|2023 Mob Vote]] or joined the [[2023 Mob Vote Event]] server.

== Appearance ==
The cape design resembles the pink leaves of [[cherry blossom]] trees.

The elytra features a four-tone gradient pattern from white from the bottom to pink to the top.

== Distribution ==

=== {{JE|nl=1}} ===
{{IN|JE}}, this cape was given to players who voted on the 2023 Mob Vote through [[minecraft.net]], the [[Minecraft Launcher]], or the [[2023 Mob Vote Event]] server.

Joining the server but not voting did not grant the cape to the player in {{JE|nl=1}}.

=== {{BE|nl=1}} ===
{{IN|BE}}, this cape was given to players who joined the 2023 Mob Vote Event server.

Voting but not joining the server did not grant the cape to the player in {{BE|nl=1}}.
